The '''Inscribed Map''' is Point of Interest in [[The Narrows]], [[Enkanomiya]], [[Inazuma]]. Interacting with it during the [[A Glimpse Into the Pale Night]] unlocks the [[Map]] of Enkanomiya (excluding [[Yachimatahiko's Locus]], [[Yachimatahime's Locus]], [[Kunado's Locus]], and the [[Vishap Research Lab]]).
